content: i love a lacy and elegant shawl and the meadows shawl crochet pattern is simply that the meadows shawl is a rectangular shawl pattern it is worked in row lengthwise using easy crochet stitches a free copy of this pattern can be found here https //richtexturescrochet com/meadows-shawl-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 20 single_crochet x 20 row of pattern = 4 inches finished size 26 inches x 80 inches yarn 1 gradient cake by panda yarns 100% cotton 5 ply 1600 yards colour wanderer hook size g 4 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
